name: SPECIAL OFFER @ COSY AND CHARMING
description: Fully furnished and renovated apartment in the historical Barceloneta district and close to main city attractions: Gothic area (10 min walk), Ramblas (15 min walk), and to the beach (1 min walk). A combination of history and sun for a wonderful stay!
neighborhood_overview: The Barceloneta is a triangular spit of land that cuts into the sea boats in the old harbour, or Barcelona’s Port Vell, on one side, and sandy beaches on the other. The neighbourhood, with its narrow, rectilinear streets, was built on a military grid structure to provide accommodation for the former inhabitants of La Ribera.  The Barceloneta was once the home of fishermen, people associated with the fishing trade and the metal industry, and is now one of the city’s most visited and popular districts. In 1988, in pre-Olympic days, the decision was taken to demolish the old beachfront restaurants, known as xiringuitos, and public baths, heralding a process of opening the city up to the sea and the modernisation of an area which now offers first-class beaches as the main attraction for its visitors.  On the sand and inside the neighbourhood, rows of restaurants and bars combine with the traditional images of locals sitting in their chairs in the street and narrow balco
host_about:
I am passionate about traveling and discovering new cities and countries.

If you are easy-going and respectful, and if you are looking for a quiet and well located apartment in central Barcelona or in Paris, then my home is the perfect accommodation for you!
